Race is a **input factor**. It means that it is one of the inputs from the user to the model.

#### Uses

Race is used by the model in the following places

* as a risk factor for [Skin cancer](/model/SkinCancer)

#### Guidance

The user input is chosen from a list and should answer the question

> What race best describes your skin?

The user has the following answer options

* White
* Black
* Asian
* Pacific


### Optimizability

[Optimizability](/model/optimizabilities) is a subjective measure used to describe how easy it is to optimize a certain factor of your life. The optimizability of Race is [1](/model/optimizabilities#category-1). This means that it can be interpreted as



> *It is impossible to change and it has never been in your control*
